entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending early this evening then partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
